details.description:
Senior Research Analyst at Arthur D. Little Middle East India office based in Gurugram. As a Senior Research Analyst, you will be part of ADL MEI's research team. Some of the sectors that we cover include Automotive & Manufacturing, Energy & Utilities, Financial Services, Healthcare, and technology and Innovation Management. You will provide research and insights to our Practice Managers, Partners, and Principals working on projects, proposals, and other IC development.


Responsibilities:

  • Research and Analysis: Conduct in-depth research on industry trends, market dynamics, competition, and client-specific issues. Collect and analyze data using various sources, such as databases, surveys, interviews, and online resources.
  • Market Intelligence: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitive landscapes to provide clients with strategic insights
  • Problem Solving: Collaborate with consultants and project teams to identify and address business challenges. Develop hypotheses and propose solutions based on research findings
  • Client Interaction: Build and maintain relationships with clients (which in this case will be ADL consultants), understand their needs, and provide expert insights and recommendations. Engage in regular communication to update clients on project progress
  • Quality Assurance: Review and validate data and analysis to ensure the highest level of accuracy and integrity. Implement quality control processes to minimize errors.


Requirements:

  • Experienced in managing a wide range of qualitative and quantitative research tasks
  • Proficiency in data analysis and the use of tools like MS Excel, PowerPoint
  • Industry Knowledge: A deep understanding of the industry or sectors relevant to the consulting firm's focus.
  • Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to convey research findings and insights clearly and concisely and the ability to create engaging and informative reports and presentations.
  • Teamwork: Collaboration and teamwork skills are essential when working with consultants and project teams
  • Proficiency in utilizing and managing databases like CapitalIQ, Factiva, EMIS Refinitiv EIKON, etc.
  • Strong business acumen and financial knowledge
  • A bachelor's or master's degree in a relevant field (e. g., business, economics, finance, market research), strong analytical skills, proficiency in data analysis tools, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
  • 4+ years of Secondary Research experience in a well-known Consulting/Research firm
details.title: Senior Research Analyst

details.description:
As the team leader for the Product Discovery & Experience charter, you will be responsible for Search, and Recommendations. You will set the vision for your charter which helps business objectives, addresses customer problems, and ensures system health. You will operate as a key thought leader and decision-maker within the org across both business and tech and will work with a broad set of cross-functional partners across marketing, revenue, operations, data science, design, engineering, analysis, and more.


Responsibilities:

  • Following is a non-exhaustive list of things you will be responsible for:
  • Business and tech goals relevant to your charter
  • Building & owning long-term vision, and product roadmaps through a mix of customer research, competitive analysis, and market & domain research
  • Owning product/feature detailing that caters to business, design, product, and tech considerations among others
  • Working with key stakeholders to plan and lead GTMs (internal/external)
  • Owning end-to-end key product metrics
  • Support projects/features led by other product managers in the organization
  • Contribute to reviews, brainstorming, and other aspects of the wider org
  • Influence business, operations, and other cross-functional stakeholders to drive change management in the organization for product/tech adoption on the ground
  • Manage reports in terms of giving meaningful work, guiding / coaching and unblocking them, monitoring their performance & planning their growth


Requirements:

  • 5+ years of work experience in Product Management and an overall experience of 6+ years
  • Strongly preferred - experience in consumer-facing B2C products at scale. Experience in a fast-paced / start-up environment is a plus
  • Strongly preferred - work experience in the domain of product discovery & experience (search, recommendations, product detail pages) and is able to demonstrate strategic thinking as well as depth in domain knowledge
  • A strong pedigree in terms of education and previous organizations is a plus
  • High degree of customer-centricity and problem/opportunity-oriented mindset
  • Has the ability to think out of the box to ideate and build solutions that are differentiated in a competitive industry
  • Ability to apply a highly structured and detail oriented approach to problem-solving. At the same time, has ability to work under pressure and deliver tangible business impact in time-critical situations
  • Go-getter attitude and bias for action with a strong ability to communicate and work collaboratively with others
  • Strong analytical ability and remains on top of metrics for area of ownership. Is also abreast with innovations & trends in the industry with a mindset to apply the relevant ones in the area of ownership
  • Demonstrated experience in working across different products and with different stakeholders while exhibiting ability to influence (successful) outcomes across several teams/functions
  • Past experience in managing people is a plus

details.description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Project Manager to join our dynamic team. As a Project Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the successful execution of various projects, ensuring timely delivery, and maintaining a high standard of quality. The ideal candidate should have at least 3 years of project management experience, with a strong background in Shopify store development. Knowledge of UI/UX design will be considered a significant advantage. This role requires the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment, juggling multiple projects concurrently.


Responsibilities:

  • Project Planning and Execution: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project scopes, objectives, and deliverables. Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and resource allocation to ensure successful project execution.
  • Shopify Store Development: Leverage your expertise in Shopify to guide and support the development team throughout the project lifecycle. Provide technical insights, solutions, and best practices to enhance the Shopify store performance and user experience.
  • Cross-Functional Coordination: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and QA, to ensure seamless collaboration and efficient project delivery.
  • Quality Control: Maintain strict quality control measures to ensure that project outcomes meet and exceed industry standards. Monitor project progress, identify potential risks, and implement effective mitigation strategies.
  • Budget and Resource Management: Manage project budgets, resource allocation, and timelines effectively. Identify opportunities for optimization to ensure projects are completed within scope and budget.
  • Fast-Paced Environment: Thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic work environment, demonstrating the ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously without compromising on quality.
  • Communication: Facilitate effective communication channels within the team and with stakeholders. Provide regular project updates, and status reports, and ensure alignment on project goals and milestones.
  • Problem Solving: Identify project-related challenges and provide creative and pragmatic solutions to overcome obstacles and keep projects on track.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in a relevant field or equivalent work experience.
  • Minimum of 4+ years of proven experience in project management, preferably in e-commerce or Shopify-related projects.
  • Strong knowledge of Shopify store development, including customizations, app integrations, and performance optimization.
  • Familiarity with UI/UX design principles and the ability to collaborate effectively with design teams.
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Exceptional problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills to facilitate effective collaboration and stakeholder management.
  • Proven track record of successful project deliveries on time and within budget.
  • Adaptability and resilience to handle changing priorities and deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
  • If you possess a passion for project management, have a solid background in Shopify development, and enjoy working in a high-energy environment with a diverse set of projects, we encourage you to apply.
details.title: Project Manager

details.description:
We are looking for a capable and dynamic Senior DevOps engineer to help setup, maintain and scale the infrastructure operations. This Individual will have the challenging responsibility of channelling our IT infrastructure and offering customer services with stringent international standard levels of service quality. This individual will leverage the latest IT tools to automate and streamline the delivery of our services while implementing industry-standard processes and knowledge management.


Responsibilities:

  • Infrastructure and Deployment Automation: Design, implement, and maintain automation for infrastructure provisioning and application deployment. Own the CI/CD pipelines and ensure they are efficient, reliable, and scalable.
  • System Monitoring and Performance: -Take ownership of monitoring systems and ensure the health and performance of the infrastructure. Proactively identify and address performance bottlenecks and system issues.
  • Cloud Infrastructure Management: Manage cloud infrastructure (e. g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and optimize resource usage. Implement cost-saving measures while maintaining scalability and reliability.
  • Configuration Management: Manage configuration management tools (e. g., Ansible, Puppet, Chef) to ensure consistency across environments. Automate configuration changes and updates.
  • Security and Compliance: Own security policies, implement best practices, and ensure compliance with industry standards. Lead efforts to secure infrastructure and applications, including patch management and access controls.
  • Collaboration with Development and Operations Teams: Foster collaboration between development and operations teams, promoting a DevOps culture. Be the go-to person for resolving cross-functional infrastructure issues and improving the development process.
  • Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity: Develop and maintain disaster recovery plans and procedures. Ensure business continuity in the event of system failures or other disruptions.
  • Documentation and Knowledge Sharing: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for configurations, processes, and best practices. Share knowledge and mentor junior team members.
  • Technical Leadership and Innovation: Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies. Lead efforts to introduce new tools and technologies that enhance DevOps practices.
  • Problem Resolution and Troubleshooting: Be responsible for diagnosing and resolving complex issues related to infrastructure and deployments. Implement preventive measures to reduce recurring problems.
  • Performance Optimisation: Continuously improve system performance and resource utilisation. Conduct capacity planning and scalability assessments.
  • Incident Response: Lead incident response activities, including root cause analysis and remediation. Be available for on-call support as needed.


Requirements:

  • B. E / B. Tech / M. E / M. Tech / MCA / M. Sc. IT (if not should be able to demonstrate required skills)
  • Overall 3+ years of experience in DevOps and Cloud operations specifically in AWS.
  • Experience with Linux Administrator
  • Experience with microservice architecture, containers, Kubernetes, and Helm is a must
  • Experience in Configuration Management preferably Ansible
  • Experience in Shell Scripting is a must
  • Experience in developing and maintaining CI/CD processes using tools like Gitlab, Jenkins
  • Experience in logging, monitoring and analytics
  • An Understanding of writing Infrastructure as a Code using tools like Terraform
  • Preferences - AWS, Kubernetes, Ansible
  • Knowledge of AWS Cloud Platform
  • Good experience with microservice architecture, Kubernetes, helm and container-based technologies
  • Hands-on experience with Ansible.
  • Should have experience in working and maintaining CI/CD Processes.
  • Hands-on experience in version control tools like GIT.
  • Experience with monitoring tools such as Cloudwatch/Sysdig etc.
  • Sound experience in administering Linux servers and Shell Scripting.
  • Should have a good understanding of IT security and have the knowledge to secure production environments (OS and server software).
  • Good to have: Preferred qualifications - AWS Certifications, Kubernetes Certifications, or the likes.
  • Knowledge/experience in managing access controls, and secret management.
  • Experience with Infrastructure as Code with Terraform/CloudFormation
  • Good understanding of various benchmarking standards like CIS.
  • Experience with Python scripting and writing SQL queries is an added bonus.
  • Ability to mentor and develop more junior members.

details.description:
The Quality Control Manager at FarmTheory plays a critical role in maintaining the quality and safety standards of the fresh produce, cloud kitchen products, and services that we provide to our restaurant chain clients. This position involves overseeing quality control processes, setting and monitoring standards, and driving continuous improvement in quality management.


Responsibilities:

  • Quality Assurance: Develop and implement quality assurance programs, policies, and procedures to maintain product integrity, consistency, and safety.
  • Quality Standards: Define and establish quality standards and specifications for all products and services, ensuring they meet or exceed industry and regulatory requirements.
  • Supplier Management: Collaborate with suppliers and vendors to ensure the quality and safety of the incoming raw materials and ingredients, and develop long-term relationships with key partners.
  • Quality Inspections: Conduct regular quality inspections, sampling, and testing of products to identify deviations and take corrective actions when necessary.
  • Documentation: Maintain accurate records and documentation related to quality control, including product specifications, inspection reports, and quality metrics.
  • Team Leadership: Lead a team of quality control inspectors, providing guidance, training, and mentorship to ensure high performance and accountability.
  • Continuous Improvement: Continuously identify areas for improvement in the quality control process and develop and implement improvement plans.
  • Compliance: Ensure compliance with all relevant food safety and quality regulations and standards, including HACCP and FDA guidelines.
  • Communication: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including procurement, production, and logistics, to communicate quality-related issues and implement corrective actions.
  • Crisis Management: Develop and execute crisis management plans to respond to quality emergencies and recalls, ensuring the safety and integrity of the supply chain.
  • Reporting: Provide regular reports and updates to senior management on quality performance, KPIs, and improvement initiatives.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as food science, agriculture, or supply chain management (Master's degree preferred).
  • Proven experience in quality control and assurance within the fresh produce or food industry, with at least 4 years in a managerial role.
  • In-depth knowledge of food safety standards, regulations, and best practices.
  • Strong leadership and team management skills.
  • Excellent communication and problem-solving abilities.
  • Detail-oriented and highly organized.
  • Proficient in using quality control tools and software.
  • Certification in relevant quality control programs (e. g., SQF, ISO 9001) is a plus.
details.title: Sr. Quality Control Manager

title: QA Manager - ISO Compliance in Software Delivery

employer.company_tagline: Activate, Engage and Retain Customers on the Digital Stage

details.description:
Seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Quality Manager to oversee ISO 9001 / ISO 27001 compliance within our software delivery organization with respect to all project delivery. As the Quality Manager, you will be responsible for maintaining an effective Integrated management system (IMS) that aligns with ISO 9001 / ISO 27001 standards and processes. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including software developers, project managers, and stakeholders to ensure adherence to ISO processes and drive continuous improvement.


The ideal candidate is expected to learn the existing ISO 9001 / ISO 27001 processes defined in the organization and develop in-depth knowledge of these to ensure all our project deliveries are rightly implementing the processes. The candidate is also expected to keep track of improvements needed to the existing processes and ensure all the processes are updated correctly following the right process.


Responsibilities:

  • Continuously develop and implement a robust Integrated management system (IMS) that complies with ISO 9001 / ISO 27001 standards for the software delivery organization.
  • Establish and maintain quality documentation, including quality manuals, procedures, work instructions, and forms, ensuring they are up-to-date and accessible to relevant stakeholders.
  • Conduct regular internal audits to assess compliance with ISO 9001 /ISO 27001 requirements, identify areas of improvement, and track corrective actions.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and document quality objectives and key performance indicators (KPIs) that align with ISO 9001 and support the organization's goals.
  • Ensure proper planning and execution of management reviews to evaluate the effectiveness of the IMS and drive continual improvement, ensuring lessons learned are captured.
  • Facilitate the identification and documentation of processes, risks, and opportunities related to quality management.
  • Provide guidance and support to project teams on implementing quality processes, conducting risk assessments, and addressing non-conformities.
  • Monitor and analyze quality performance metrics, such as defect rates, customer satisfaction, and process efficiency, and report findings to senior management.
  • Stay updated with the latest developments and amendments to ISO 9001 standards, ensuring the quality management system (QMS) remains compliant and aligned with best practices.
  • Collaborate with external auditors during ISO 9001 / ISO 27001 certification audits and effectively address audit findings and recommendations.
  • Drive weekly meetings with a number of stakeholders and generate/maintain weekly reports as required as per the processes.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • Proven experience (5-years expected) working as a Quality Manager, Quality Assurance Manager, or in a similar role, with a focus on ISO 9001 / ISO 27001
  • compliance within the software industry.
  • In-depth knowledge of ISO 9001 / ISO 27001 requirements and experience implementing and maintaining ISO 9001-certified / ISO 27001 IMS.
  • Strong understanding of software development methodologies, quality assurance practices, and their alignment with ISO 9001 / ISO 27001
  • Proficiency in conducting internal audits, managing corrective actions, and facilitating management reviews.
  • Familiarity with risk management principles and tools, particularly in the context of software development.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify non-conformities, assess risks, and propose effective solutions.
  • Strong leadership and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and senior management.
  • Experience in managing ISO certification audits and working with external auditors.
  • Certifications such as ISO Lead Auditor or ISO Internal Auditor are highly desirable.
  • Strong working experience in tools such as MS Excel, MPP, and Power BI are highly desirable.

Requirements:

  • Team Lead Experience: Proven experience in a team lead role, preferably within collections operations for the US or UK markets.

  • Leadership Abilities: Strong leadership skills with the ability to motivate and guide a team towards achieving targets and objectives.
  • Analytical Thinking: Proficiency in analysing performance metrics, identifying trends, and making data-driven decisions.

details.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and visionary Enterprise Architect to join our team of A-players. The ideal candidate will play a critical role in shaping the technological landscape of our AI venture, ensuring that our systems and applications align with the company's strategic goals. As an Enterprise Architect, you will work collaboratively to design, build, and oversee the implementation of our technology solutions, providing strategic guidance and ensuring architectural best practices. This is a great opportunity to build our platform and solutions from ground up.


Responsibilities:

  • You will play a pivotal role in crafting the architectural design for our core AI platform.
  • This involves creating a blueprint for the platform's structure, defining how different components and modules interact, and ensuring it aligns with the company's strategic vision.
  • You will consider the following critical factors while developing this architecture
  • Identifying and Defining Key Components
  • Scalability and Flexibility
  • Security and Compliance
  • Performance Optimisation
  • Usability and User Experience
  • Alignment with Business Objectives
  • Collaborate with stakeholders, including executives, business leaders, and IT teams, to understand business needs and define architecture requirements.
  • Define and promote architectural best practices and standards, guiding the development and integration of solutions.
  • Evaluate and select technology solutions, platforms, and tools to support the company's long-term vision.
  • Lead and oversee the implementation of architectural designs, ensuring adherence to established guidelines.
  • Continuously assess and enhance the company's technology architecture to meet evolving business needs.
  • Mentor and coach technical teams, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and excellence.
  • Report directly to the Chief Technology Officer (CTO) and manage C-suite stakeholder relationships to ensure alignment of technology strategy with overall business goals.


Requirements:

  • Proven experience as an Enterprise Architect with a minimum of 8-10 years in Product development or Solution Engineering roles
  • Experience working with C-suite executives, and managing c-suite stakeholders
  • Strong knowledge of architectural frameworks and methodologies.
  • Proficiency in designing complex, scalable, and secure technology solutions.
  • Experience in evaluating and selecting technology platforms and tools.
  • Strong leadership and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and manage C-suite stakeholders.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills.
  • Knowledge of AI tools, LLMs and open source AI models a plus
  • Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, information technology, or related fields.
details.title: Enterprise Architect

details.description:
Arre Voice is seeking a motivated and passionate Associate Product Manager to join our team and help build our new interest-led, social platform space. As an Associate Product Manager, you will work closely with the Senior Product Manager to develop and execute the product vision, strategy, and roadmap for our new platform. You will also collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design, engineering, marketing, and content, to ensure the success of the Arr Voice app.


In this role, you will work to make sure that Arre Voice delivers the best possible audio UGC (User-generated content) experience (with easy discovery enabled) for its users and offers a seamless experience for creators to monetize their talents. This is a cross-functional role (you are the owner of the product module) that requires collaboration with the design, Engineering & analytics team with the candidate demonstrating the ability to talk to different teams in their own language. The role also requires you to be externally facing with the ability to build strong feedback loops with users for the product decisions to be entirely data-driven. .


Responsibilities:

  • As a Senior Product Manager, these are the things that we will be expecting from you:
  • 1st principle thinking; the ability to apply common sense logic to build products from scratch and the vision to scale it to enable a million plus users environment for the app
  • Astute customer understanding; a very strong customer focussed approach to solving problem
  • Deep interest in behavioral theory and how to leverage it to solve human motivation
  • Focus on talking to customers/users to get an intuitive understanding of how they think and behave
  • Data-oriented approach, a key eye for numbers, market insights, and an appetite for business context and metrics. And the ability to run A/Bs experiments to constantly benchmark the best user experience
  • Effective communication skills, the ability to articulate and evangelize product vision, strategy priority, and market plans' in a compelling manner
  • Owner mentality; willingness to take initiative, speed of decision making, and the accountability to dive closure, tenacity, and grit
  • The ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams yet the assertiveness and influence to rally people around the 'right' products


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related fields from premier institutes, or equivalent practical experience. A postgraduate degree is an added plus.
  • 5-7 years of hands-on Product Management experience with mostly unicorns across industries like e-commerce, fintech, social media/UGC brands. The candidate must have led/been a part of the team that scaled consumer products to more than a million downloads/users
  • Worked on complex cross-functional products and has gone through the whole product journey of defining strategy to driving go-to-market
  • Prior product management experience at a 0-1 start-up is a plus.
  • Experience collaborating with developers, breaking down complex product vision into simpler user stories conducive to execution.
  • Communication with the Engineering team and communicating in a language that developers understand is critical
  • Astute understanding of the scrum process of software development and managing a team of developers, QA testers, and designers
  • Deep experience in leveraging tools like click up/Jira for project/sprint/scrum planning.
  • Obsession with delivering the best end-user experience with a strong bias to action and hungry for more feedback.

employer.company_tagline: Providing custom software solutions for all the business needs

details.description:
As a Senior Salesforce Consultant Developer, you'll play a vital role at HJ Software We are looking for an individual who can help us continually improve and enhance our client's Salesforce platform Salesforce instance is of great importance to us, therefore you should keep the wider organization's best interests in mind when composing and deploying any code. We are looking for someone who is a self-starter Technically sound with 7+ years of Experience, open to learning best practice, and independently handle the entire project


Responsibilities:

  • Create technical documentation that is available and responsive to questions.
  • Develop Apex (classes and triggers), Lightning Components, and Visualforce to extend Salesforce in order to support business requirements,
  • Application development, including basic Visualforce pages/Lightning pages, and Lightning Web Components, Assist with each release cycle to implement and deploy new/updates to existing applications and code,
  • Working with integrated applications
  • Testing** (unit and systems), and debugging,
  • Strive towards coding best practices and data quality and Contribute to technical documentation
  • You will be responsible for developing through all phases of the development lifecycle, from initial technical designs, implementation, and testing, to production deployments. Your ability to quickly learn new features, and technologies, and to communicate effectively with various business owners, technical staff members, and cross-functional teams will help you to design, develop, and configure cutting-edge Salesforce.com products.
  • To be successful in this position, you must provide expertise on the Salesforce.com Apex, APIs, profiles, security model, Chat, Service Console, and Experience Cloud (community) while maintaining and configuring development and test instances for our internal sandboxes.
  • Knowledge of systems that includes designing and developing systems end-to-end solution
  • You will also be expected to provide detailed best practices and documentation for your applications to the IT Support organization.
  • You should be a self-starter with the ability to take ownership, work under pressure, and handle multiple tasks simultaneously. You must possess good oral and written documentation skills and be able to interact with the client to deliver fast and reliable code.
  • Manage users, and apps (custom and installed), including integrations with third-party systems
  • Must be able to set, manage, and update security settings like OWD, field level security, profiles, permission sets, and roles effectively
  • Create and manage standard/custom objects, standard/custom fields, object relationships, validation rules, custom buttons, and page layouts
  • Create new and maintain existing workflow rules, approval processes flow, and process builder processes
  • Must have worked in a Lightning-enabled environment
  • Should be able to independently handle data migrations across Salesforce organizations
  • Own CRM data integrity including record de-duping and cleanup Monitor, measure, and communicate metrics
  • Develop and implement training to drive adoption and usage
  • Evaluate new tools as they become available, communicating future Salesforce releases and enhancements
  • Develop and maintain process documentation, workflows, and field maps
  • Create dashboards, reports, and custom report types, evolving analytics to uncover patterns and insights
  • Collaborate cross-functionally to document business and technical requirements.
  • Identify and evaluate potential global and local integration or third-party vendors, Manage vendor relationships with Salesforce and any other third parties
  • Schedule, plan, and execute deployments by effectively collaborating with development teams using change sets/IDE/other migration tools
  • Troubleshoot any existing issues and recommend solutions Excellent verbal and written communication skills Good to have Experience working with SaaS companies Exceptional organization, prioritization, multi-tasking, and time management Skills.
  • Note: As a Senior Sales Force Consultant ( Developer / Administrator ) expected to be proficient with integrations, Build new integrations or adapt existing ones, and also manage.


Requirements:

  • Experience implementing and developing in Apex, Visualforce, and Javascript,
  • A proactive attitude to Salesforce enhancements,
  • A good work ethic, ready to absorb best practices, developing solutions with best practices front of mind
  • Ability to interpret technical specifications,
  • Competency in HTML, XML, Flex, ASP, SQL, Java or C++, HMTL5 CSS3 and Javascript Design and developing the solutions for system integration using REST and SOAP-based web services
  • Familiarity with developing on other cloud platforms, such as Microsoft Azure or Amazon Web Services,
  • Contribution to open-source projects, or personal projects in a good state of development,
  • Demonstrates continued personal/professional development is active in the Salesforce community.
  • Excellent Lightning, LWC Aura, and APEX code knowledge and extensively worked on Lightning components.
  • Functional knowledge of Salesforce Service and Experience Cloud is required with an understanding of sites, knowledge articles, case management, service console, and live chat. Etc. is a must.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Hands-on experience on APEX Data Loader/Middleware technologies Webservices and Integration patterns.
  • Object Oriented Programming (OOP) is a Must skill, Knowledge of (JAVA) is desirable and advantageous
  • Solid Programming abilities in one or more following languages: Oracle PL/SQL, JavaScript
  • You must have an excellent understanding of the Salesforce platform and products, such as the Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Experience Cloud (community), and Force. com. As a Senior Salesforce developer,
  • You must have a solid foundation in programming to demonstrate in writing efficient and scalable pricing, Apex Code, Aura Components, and Lightning Web Components
  • Experience - 7 to 8 year
  • Required: Salesforce product knowledge and 6 - 8 yrs Experience of in Salesforce development
  • Certified Salesforce Platform Developer I, Platform Developer 2
  • Additional Salesforce certifications e. g. Certified Salesforce Administrator, Certified Javascript Developer
  • Bachelor's Degree, a professional qualification / equivalent experience.
details.title: Senior Salesforce Consultant Developer

details.description:
As a Software Engineer, you will participate in all aspects of software development (design, development, testing, maintenance, support) of the business's applications. This is a hands-on development role responsible for design, implementation, and life cycle management of the product built/configured on the Huron platform.


You also could have the opportunity to work with one or more development teams that are responsible for web applications, able to contribute to the design, implementation, and maintenance of applications and technologies owned by the assigned team, be delivering quality client and server-side code, markup, and CSS as needed, while adhering to best practices and standard. In addition, you'd be expected to attend all team meetings while making meaningful contributions and provide regular updates (via tools, meetings, communication, etc. ) to the team lead of assigned teams.


You'll be part of the Huron Higher Education team with opportunities to collaborate, learn and grow while impacting some of the most prestigious higher education and research institutions.

  • React or other web application frameworks

details.description:
As a Senior QA Engineer, you will be responsible for leading and executing the quality assurance activities for our e-commerce platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, implement, and execute comprehensive test strategies, ensuring the delivery of high-quality software solutions. Your expertise in test planning, test execution, and basic automation knowledge will play a vital role in maintaining the integrity and stability of our e-commerce systems.


Responsibilities:

  • Lead the planning, design, and implementation of test strategies and test plans for our e-commerce platform, considering both functional and non-functional requirements.
  • Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define clear and comprehensive test cases and acceptance criteria.
  • Conduct thorough and systematic testing of our Database, web and mobile applications, including functional, regression, integration, and performance testing.
  • Utilize basic automation knowledge to automate repetitive tasks and streamline the testing process.
  • Perform database testing and have a strong understanding of basic SQL and database concepts.
  • Monitor and analyze test results, identify and report defects, and work closely with development teams to ensure timely resolution.
  • Continuously improve the QA process by identifying areas for optimization, implementing best practices, and staying up to date with emerging testing methodologies and tools.
  • Mentor and provide guidance to junior members of the QA team, fostering a culture of continuous learning and professional growth.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to investigate and troubleshoot production issues, ensuring the successful resolution and prevention of future incidents.
  • Participate in release management activities, coordinating with the development and operations teams to ensure smooth and successful software deployments.


Requirements:

  • Experience: 3-5 years
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Equivalent work experience will also be considered.
  • Proven experience as a QA Engineer or similar role, with a minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience in testing web and mobile applications.
  • Strong understanding of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes, including test planning, test case development, and defect tracking.
  • Knowledge of basic automation and the ability to automate repetitive tasks.
  • Experience in API Testing using tools
  • Solid knowledge of basic SQL and database concepts for performing database testing.
  • Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies and the ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
  • Basic Knowledge of performance testing and load testing tools, such as JMeter or LoadRunner, is highly desirable.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and communicate risks and issues effectively.
  • Strong attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
  • Proven ability to meet project deadlines and deliver high-quality software.
  • Plus points if you have worked on product based company with a preferred domain of ecommerce
details.title: Sr. QA Engineer

details.description:
We are seeking a Product Manager to help bring this vision to life. As part of the team, your job will be to identify and define the underlying components/ primitive services within the CoreOS, determine development approach to ensure a high degree of reliability, consistency and universal applicability, and seed/ nurture a 3rd party developer ecosystem that will leverage the CoreOS to build business and functional applications on it. The role is an inherent blend of technology, product management, and product marketing. To succeed, you need to be a highly analytical, first principles thinker who is resourceful, goal-driven, is able to convert abstract thoughts/ ideas into tactical developer-friendly documentation, and has the ability to marry technological competence with an in-depth understanding of customer requirements. Above all - you should should enjoy getting your hands dirty, and thrive on end-to-end ownership The role is inherently technical, and requires someone to have a strong background in building, or working with technology/ developer-focused products. Our team is small, so there is a strong emphasis for someone to come aboard, establish systems and processes to help grow the team, along with the creative freedom to define the future trajectory of the product


Responsibilities:

  • Create the vision, define the product roadmaps, and own execution of all CoreOS components
  • Identify and define associated integration services and solutions required to ensure universal applicability of CoreOS components
  • Determine GTM strategy to enable and engage with a robust 3rd party developer ecosystem building business applications on CoreOS
  • Develop feedback loops to ensure continuous evolution of CoreOS components
  • Lead cross-functional teams in close partnership with engineering and design to bring the platform vision to life


Requirements:

  • Undergraduate degree in engineering or a related technical discipline from a Tier-I institute, MBA preferred
  • 10+ years of product management experience in internet startups, enterprise-grade SaaS products, supply chain organization or e-commerce
  • Strong communication and organization skills, as well as the ability to think clearly, analyse quantitatively, problem-solve, multi-task and prioritise
  • Sound business judgment, attention to detail, proven ability to influence others, demonstrated experience engaging and influencing senior executives, and a strong analytical mindset
  • Experience in managing technical software products from kick-off to ship, building APIs, SDKs and complex integrated systems at scale is a plus
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment, along with the tenacity to develop ideas independently and the conviction to drive them to completion is crucial for this role
  • Experience in building product and/ or platform-based integration technology suited for high scale and performance is a big plus

Responsibilities:

  • Project Management: To lead and oversee the entire product development lifecycle, ensuring that projects are completed on time, within scope, and budget
  • Technical Expertise: Understand the technical aspects of our products and provide valuable insights and direction to the development teams
  • Cross - Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, and content development, to ensure alignment on project goals and deliverables
  • Requirement Analysis: Work closely with stakeholders to gather and document project requirements, ensuring that they are clearly defined and understood
  • Risk Management: Implement rigorous risk checks at each tracking step, in collaboration with the respective partner. Mitigate risks with stakeholders and escalate when no immediate solution is available Objectives & Key Results Alignment: Continuously align OKRs with changing priorities to facilitate continuous business evolution

  • Continuous Improvement: Implement and refine project management methodologies and best practices to enhance efficiency and productivity
  • Reporting: Generate regular project progress reports and present project status to senior management and stakeholders
  • Pod Ownership: Implement a "checkers at each stage" approach, where individual owners of the pod are responsible for maintaining JIRA, creating analytics reports, and delivering on committed date
  • Jira Expertise: Manage Jira issues and uphold the quality requirements of issue tracking, ensuring accurate and reliable project data.


Requirements:

  • Experience in power supplies, DC-DC converters, power traces, Bus Bar calculation, High voltage / High current isolation
  • Must have hands-on experience in Impedance-controlled board routing, DDR routing, processor on processor-on-board routing.

  • Must have strong experience in SI(Signal Integrity) analysis.
  • Must have strong knowledge of PI(Power Integrity) analysis.
  • Strong knowledge of the thermal consideration of the designs.

  • Very good experience in DFx standards (DFM / DFA / DFT).
  • Must have working experience in Stacked and complex boards with high layer count.
  • Must be strong in Constraint-driven methodology.
  • Strong experience in CAM350 Gerber validation tool.
  • Self-drive, motivated, and show high productivity in PCB design and development

details.description:
Consulting Engineers drive customer success by helping them realize business value from the burgeoning flow of real-time data streams in their organizations. In this role you'll interact directly with our customers to provide software, development and operations expertise, leveraging deep knowledge of best practices in the use of Apache Kafka, the broader Confluent Platform, and complementary systems like Hadoop, Spark, Storm, relational databases, and various NoSQL databases.


Throughout all of these interactions, you'll build strong relationships with customers, ensure exemplary delivery standards, and have a lot of fun building state-of-the-art streaming data infrastructure alongside colleagues who are widely recognized as leaders in this space.

Promoting Confluent and our amazing team to the community and wider public audience is something we invite all our employees to take part in. This can be in the form of writing blog posts, speaking at meetups and well-known industry events about use cases and best practices, or as simple as releasing code.

details.description:
The Technical Lead is one of the primary client-facing individuals and a critical member of the organization. This is a hands-on position where you will create and enforce project-specific standards, augment and enhance our solutions, benchmark individual and application performance metrics as well and estimate the level of effort for initiatives. The ideal candidate must be a self-starter and able to work independently.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop, manage, and implement deliverables of our cross-functional teams that are focused on implementing our products for the Oil and Gas industry. Managing existing implementations, and conducting internal R& D; initiatives.
  • Excellent analytical skills for troubleshooting customers' requests/issues.
  • Deep commitment to quality, self-improvement, and team-oriented development.
  • Review technical design specifications.
  • Participate in functional, regression, and performance testing.
  • Issue triage and tracking.
  • Coordinate between teams of technical resources and business stakeholders and have a thorough understanding of the technologies, systems, and processes that will be used in achieving project objectives
  • Emphasize executing on time, on budget, and with high customer satisfaction.
  • Gather and document client business processes and requirements
  • Make recommendations and changes to improve and support business activities.
  • Interact with different client groups to provide technical support.
  • Assist teams with the planning and design of business processes and systems.
  • Excellent knowledge of the company's business procedures and objectives.
  • Demonstrate superior collaboration and problem-solving skills.
  • Organization, good judgment, communication skills, analytical skills, excellent written and verbal communication, and decision-making skills.
  • Write user documentation as needed.
  • Organize and perform client training sessions (formal and informal)
  • Post-go live support


Requirements:

  • Experience and Education Requirements
  • BA/BS degree in Business, Engineering, Computer Science or technical equivalent
  • Or, Master's Degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Engineering, or technical equivalent
  • Knowledge of internet-based systems including experience developing web-based applications.
  • 5+ years of C# development experience, plus at least 1 year with ASP. NET. Exposure to the development of Windows Services, WCF services or WEB API is a plus.
  • Understanding of the Microsoft. NET Framework. Development experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, XML/JSON, and/or other programming languages and tools. Exposure to MVC, WPF, Entity Framework, JavaScript Frameworks, Java/J2EE, or log4net is a plus.
  • Development and administration experience in SQL Server 2012 or later. Understanding of TSQL, stored procedure design, and database performance optimization (table indexing, query optimization, etc. ). Additionally, experience with Oracle and/or other relational database management systems is a plus. Experience with NoSQL databases like MongoDB is also a plus.
  • Knowledge of administering and configuring Windows Internet Information Services (IIS). Experience with Windows MSMQ, Active Directory / ADAM / ADLDS / LDAP is a plus.
  • Experience with Business Intelligence and report designing tools such as Crystal Reports and/or Microsoft SSRS.
  • Experience with developing custom interfaces between software solutions using one or more of the following is desirable: Web API / Web Services, Microsoft SSIS, OLEDB, XML, PIDEX, CSV, or Excel. Exposure to SCADA, OSI PI, and other historians is a plus.
  • Comfortable adapting existing experiences to new environments.
  • Passionate about technology and applying it to business processes.
  • Ability to effectively communicate with the clients and team members (oral, written & visual).
  • Experience with project lifecycles from requirements to support transition.
  • Strong communication, presentation, and collaboration skills.
  • Attention to detail and exemplary organizational skills.
  • Oil & Gas experience.
  • Visio and Access experience, are a plus.
  • Intermediate to Expert in MS Excel, MS Word, and MS PowerPoint.
  • Good balance of technical knowledge and business acumen to help the team capture, evaluate, analyze, and deliver on business needs.
  • Experience with new product development and release cycles in a Professional Services/Technology Solutions environment is a plus, as is experience with distributed and overseas teams.
  • KFLA
  • Action Oriented, Being Resilient, Drives Results
  • Additional Notes

Create solutions with delightful user experiences and find the balance between solving the customer problem and shipping the right product solution. We take pride in releasing the smallest of features while iterating and shipping regularly.

As our Cloud Security Engineer III / Lead, you will be responsible for the security assessment of infrastructure/cloud. Implementing and managing security controls for cloud services which includes Secure configuration management for all Cloud native services, setting up processes and guidelines. The goal is to build Seamless Security. We want you to redefine how developers view security, eliminating friction and improving Security natively. You will work closely with other Security functions, DevOps, Architects and Developers, and QA to build highly reliable and secure products on the cloud.


Responsibilities:

  • Understand the Amazon identity management ecosystem holistically and create a secure infrastructure, Enforce compliance with IAM principles including least privilege access, password management, Audit logging, RBAC, user account lifecycle, certificate management, and system authentication solutions(SSO/Federation). Minimum of 3 years of experience with AWS.
  • Prepare reference architectures for Developer adoption- Secure Cloud Architecture.
  • Devise and implement Serverless, Container, and Kubernetes Security Strategies in the company.
  • Deploy CNAPP(Cloud-Native Application Protection Platform)- CSPM, CWPP solutions at a large scale.
  • Lead Remediation for findings from CSPM(Cloud Security Posture Management), work with developers on targeted remediation based on prioritization
  • Experience working with Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) to secure-by-design solutions to mitigate/fix cloud security issues(Terraform, Cloud formation, etc)
  • Build Tools to assist Engineering teams with the remediation of issues at scale across the Cloud.
  • Building security tooling to aid with the protection of data stored in the cloud and compliant with relevant regulations- Enforcement of Cloud Data Protection Guidelines from the Risk team.
  • Improve Web App Firewalls (WAF), prior experience with WAF rule fine-tuning a plus. Ensure early Identification of intrusion & attacks and implement countermeasures.
  • Experience with solutions around DDoS and identifying Anti-bot patterns for critical flows.
  • Partner with the SOC team for Security Incident Management and Remediation triage with Engineering across the ecosystem.


Requirements:

  • Overall 7+ years of relevant experience
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related technical discipline, or equivalent practical experience.
  • Solid understanding of Amazon Web Services (AWS) including VPC, ELB, IAM, KMS, EC2 S3 CloudTrail, CloudFormation, CloudWatch, Cloud HSM, AWS Encryption SDK, RDS, ELB, AWS Route 53 CloudFront, SNS
  • Experience with enforcement of Security Best practices via Cloud Formation/Terraform IaC.
  • Understanding of security frameworks and standards like OWASP & NIST, Solid understanding of security protocols, cryptography, authentication, authorization
  • Good understanding of Linux and Windows OS, TCP/IP protocol stack and networking fundamentals, and security principles at all layers of the OSI stack
  • Experience with API security, AWS cloud security, container security, network security, cryptography, PKI, certificate management,
  • Experience in CI/CD Tools Including Git, Jenkins, Ansible, or similar
  • Experience in designing cloud-native security architectures applying defense-in-depth strategies
  • Advanced Expertise in at least one language, Shell scripting/Python/Go/NodeJS, and AWS CLI
  • Expert knowledge of container security (Docker/Kubernetes), Container security tools such as Twistlock and Aqua Security, etc
  • Experience with third-party/open-source cloud security tools
  • Experience with tooling and systems for a build, infrastructure automation, and monitoring

Responsibilities:

  • You'll design, implement, and evolve critical, high-quality, scalable software systems
  • You'll understand security protocols and use them as building blocks to build security features
  • You'll work on new security-related product features to make customer data more secure
  • You'll identify attack surfaces and build solutions to harden Rubrik products
  • You'll review designs and implementations of general product features to ensure security best practices are followed
  • You will evangelize secure coding practices across all engineering teams
  • You will be expected to create highly effective documentation to enable the engineering team to use existing security primitives safely
  • You will partner with the Information security team during regular assessment of Vulnerabilities identified by infrastructure scan, evaluate and perform risk assessment towards the product. Prioritizing the vulnerabilities discovered along with remediation timelines
  • Understand Complex technical security architectures (including cloud architecture) and apply that to Compliance and Certifications as needed
  • Participate in product and production support operations focused on Identities and Access Management (IAM) and Role Based Access Controls (RBAC) strategies and implementations
  • Be the technical Security Point for Rubrik products with regard to security aspects
  • Demonstrate ownership and accountability for the product roadmap
  • Strongly influence decision-makers and stakeholders to consistently raise the security bar
  • Support for mentoring, team building, and recruitment activities in a company where security is a critical priority
  • Help develop a complex security system using cipher and algorithm along with various key rotation techniques to protect data from misuse


Requirements:

  • Experience in data security and information security. This experience should be demonstrated through practical applications in protecting sensitive data and defending against various cyber-attacks
  • Data protection for both data in rest and data in flight - Need to be aware of the latest security standards and protocols for both encryption and communication
  • Provide Identity and Access Management(IAM) advisory, solution architecting and consulting to internal teams.
  • Well-versed in the best practices while dealing with secrets and other sensitive information - Need to also educate the team as a whole.
  • Strong technical skills, especially in areas like encryption, network security, application security, cloud security, and identity and access management. These skills should be complemented by a thorough understanding of computer science fundamentals and systems architecture.
  • Experience in systems administration for Linux and Windows operating systems would be good to have
  • Total 15 years + of experience
  • Familiarity with the security challenges that arise in the context of SaaS products, microservices architecture, and containerization. And familiarity with security and encryption practices on a Linux machine.
  • At least 5 years for technology-focused FedRAMP risk assessments and remediation management. Prior FedRAMP Moderate, High IL5 assessment experience is a plus
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or a related field (Master's degree is a plus)
  • Proficiency in using applied cryptography to ensure the privacy and integrity of data
  • Proficiency in identifying common classes of vulnerabilities (e. g., OWASP Top 10)
  • Deep understanding of Linux internals, containers and virtualization
  • Experience in architecting and developing security features for large-scale systems
  • Proficiency in core security principles and commonly used protocols and technologies
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team

details.description:
We are looking for a skilled react.js developer to join our front-end development team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using React.js concepts and workflows such as Redux, Flux, and Webpack. You will also be responsible for profiling and improving front-end performance and documenting our front-end codebase. To ensure success as a react.js developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of JavaScript and React concepts, excellent front-end coding skills, and a good understanding of progressive web applications. Ultimately, a top-class react.js developer should be able to design and build modern user interface components to enhance application performance.


Responsibilities:

  • Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.
  • Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.
  • Identifying web-based user interactions.
  • Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts.
  • Writing application interface codes using JavaScript following react.js workflows.
  • Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.
  • Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.
  • Monitoring and improving front-end performance.
  • Documenting application changes and developing updates.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a similar field.
  • Previous experience working as a react.js developer.
  • In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages.
  • Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Enzyme, Redux, and Flux. Experience with user interface design.
  • Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest.
  • Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software.
  • Excellent troubleshooting skills.
  • Good project management skills.

details.description:
Requirements:

  • Experience: Minimum 3 years++
  • Education: Information & Technology Engineer / Computer Engineer, Computer Science
  • Only hiring experienced candidates.
  • JavaScript: Strong proficiency in JavaScript is essential for both front-end (React) and back-end (Node.js ) development. Make sure you have a solid understanding of core JavaScript concepts, including ES6+ features, asynchronous programming, and functional programming.
  • React: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Familiarize yourself with Redact's core concepts, such as components, state management, JSX syntax, and React Router for handling client-side routing.
  • Node.js : Node.js is a runtime environment that allows you to run JavaScript on the server side. Gain a good understanding of Node.js concepts, including event-driven architecture, the Express framework for building APIs, and modules like fs and path for working with the file system.
  • MongoDB: MongoDB is a NoSQL database commonly used with Node.js . Learn the fundamentals of MongoDB, including data modeling, querying, and using the MongoDB Node.js driver or an ORM like Mongoose to interact with the database.
  • RESTful APIs: Understand how to design and build RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express. Learn about HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), status codes, request/response handling, authentication, and validation.
  • Front-end Technologies: Alongside React, having knowledge of HTML, CSS, and CSS frameworks like Bootstrap or Material-UI will enable you to build responsive and visually appealing user interfaces.
  • Version Control: Proficiency with a version control system like Git is crucial for collaborative development. Learn the basic commands, branching, merging, and best practices for managing your codebase.
  • Testing: Familiarize yourself with testing frameworks and libraries such as Jest or Mocha for writing unit tests and integration tests. Understanding concepts like test-driven development (TDD) will help you create robust and maintainable code.
  • Deployment and DevOps: Gain knowledge of deployment processes, containerization with Docker, and container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes. Learn how to deploy your applications to platforms like AWS, Azure, or Heroku.
  • Problem-Solving and Debugging: Developing strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug and troubleshoot issues efficiently is crucial for any developer. Learn how to use debugging tools and techniques to identify and resolve problems effective

details.description:
We are looking for a passionate Backend Software Engineer to join the Fulfilment Optimisation team. This team builds the platforms that determine how customer orders are fulfilled, optimizing for Wayfair's profitability and customer delight. A big part of our work revolves around enhancing and scaling customer-facing platforms that provide Fulfillment information on our websites, starting at the top of the customer funnel on the search pages through orders being delivered. Throughout this customer journey, we are responsible for maintaining an accurate representation of our dynamic supply chain, determining how different products will fit into boxes, predicting how these boxes will flow through warehouses and trucks, and ultimately surfacing the information our customers need to inform their decision and the details our suppliers and carriers require to successfully execute on the promises made to our customers. We do all of this in milliseconds, thousands of times per second.


Responsibilities:

  • Partner with your business stakeholders to provide them with transparency, data, and resources to make informed decisions
  • Be a technical leader within and across the teams you work with.
  • Drive high-impact architectural decisions and hands-on development, including inception, design, execution, and delivery following good design and coding practices.
  • Obsessively focus on production readiness for the team including testing, monitoring, deployment, documentation, and proactive troubleshooting.
  • Identify risks and gaps in technical approaches and propose solutions to meet team and project goals.
  • Create proposals and action plans to garner support across the organization.
  • Influence and contribute to the team's strategy and roadmap.
  • Tenacity for learning - curious, and constantly pushing the boundary of what is possible.
  • Responsible for designing and being hands-on in building web-based, event-driven, cloud-enabled applications that are reliable, scalable, and easy to maintain;
  • Ensure the quality of engineering direction across multiple teams
  • Contribute to architectural and code review discussions that impact our engineering ecosystem
  • Define standards to raise the bar of the teams you'll be working with.
  • Mentor less experienced software engineers
  • Collaborate with leads and engineers across multiple teams to solve a wide variety of business and technical problems.
  • Contribute to the growth and development of the Wayfair engineering scene within Bengaluru and beyond.

details.description:
AMC is seeking a Sr Support Engineer to provide support to partners and external customers as they build business-critical applications on our platform. You'll also work directly with Amazon Advertising product and engineering teams to ensure that customer issues are resolved as expediently as possible.


In this role, you will independently resolve customer issues and blockers by providing knowledgeable and responsive technical support on AMC. Our customers are large enterprises, direct and agencies. You would often interact with customers' Data Analysts and other Data focused stakeholders. You would use advanced SQL skills to build confidence and solutions. You will have ownership for issue investigation, identifying root cause and software defects, conceive and provide workarounds if acceptable to customers for continuity.


You will gather sufficient information that helps reproduce issues and contribute to building software fixes. This is a complex, and fast-paced environment as you will own the most critical part of the customer experience and delivering on our customers' most basic need. While we obsess over issue resolution, in this role you will also develop tools to scale our support & service quality, and provide critical input for product prioritization to address root causes of why the customer experienced an issue in the first place. Our advertising customers are likely Amazon customers, and we take seriously maintaining the high customer service bar set by Amazon to be the level at which we need to operate.


Responsibilities:

  • Track, investigate, and resolve customer questions and issues using appropriate communication channel including phone, email, and live as well as asynchronous at various levels of complexity and customer impact.
  • Act as an escalation point for the most complex and in-depth issues that potentially span multiple external and internal organisations.
  • Communicate directly with internal organisations to complete root cause analyses, issue investigation, workarounds and defect resolution.
  • Develop and implement complex repro cases to identify potential software defects, mis-configurations, or issues in customer environments.
  • Use case management tools to manage and prioritise issues based on multiple factors including customer impact.
  • Build & Contribute to training material and documentation for both internal and customer-facing users.
  • Actively seeking solutions to customer needs, communicating trends to leadership, and suggesting innovative solutions on behalf of the customer experience.
  • Providing support directly to data analysts who are using Amazon Marketing Cloud.
  • Writing queries, code samples, tutorials, and technical articles for the customer community
  • Working with customers to understand how they are using our services, and providing feedback to development teams
  • Collaborating with internal stakeholders to drive timely customer communication
  • Driving internal projects that improve support-related processes and our customer's user experience

details.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Data Lake Lead with expertise in Hadoop, Impala, Hive, and Kafka to join our team. The Data Lake Lead will play a crucial role in managing and optimising our data lake environment, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval, and enabling data-driven decision-making across the organization.


Responsibilities:

  • Design, implement, and maintain the Data Lake architecture, with a strong focus on Hadoop, Impala, Hive, and Kafka technologies.
  • Define and enforce data governance policies, data quality standards, and access controls within the Data Lake.
  • Oversee the ingestion of data from various sources into the Data Lake, leveraging Kafka for real-time data streaming.
  • Integrate and transform data using Hive and Impala for analytics, reporting, and machine learning.
  • Optimise the Data Lake for performance, scalability, and cost-effectiveness, especially within the Hadoop ecosystem.
  • Implement data partitioning, indexing, and compression strategies to improve query and data retrieval times.
  • Implement and maintain data security and compliance standards, especially within the Hadoop ecosystem, to protect sensitive information.
  • Ensure the Data Lake complies with industry regulations and data privacy requirements.
  • Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists, analysts, and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and provide support for their data-related initiatives.
  • Implement monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify and address issues within the Data Lake, including Kafka monitoring.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve data-related problems in a timely manner.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or a related field.
  • years of experience in data engineering and data lake management, with a focus on Hadoop, Impala, Hive, and Kafka.
  • Strong expertise in data lake technologies and related components.
  • Proficiency in data integration tools and frameworks, with a strong understanding of Kafka.
  • Excellent programming and scripting skills, including experience with Hive QL and Impala SQL.
  • Strong knowledge of data security and compliance standards, especially within Hadoop.
  • Exceptional problem-solving and communication skills.
  • Certifications in relevant technologies (e. g., Cloudera Certified Data Engineer, Confluent Certified Developer for Apache Kafka, etc. ).
  • Experience with big data technologies, including Hadoop ecosystem components.
  • Knowledge of data orchestration tools (e. g., Apache Airflow).
  • Familiarity with machine learning and AI concepts.
details.title: Data Lakes Engineer

details.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Technical Lead Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our cloud-based Software-as-a-Service (SAAS) platform. You will play a crucial role in leading the technical direction, architecture, and implementation of our backend systems. Collaboration with cross-functional teams, including product managers, frontend engineers, and DevOps, will be essential to deliver high-quality, scalable, and reliable solutions. Are you up for the challenge of building an amazing product and team from scratch and taking your career to the next level? If building an exceptional distributed team excites you, if building an awesome enterprise product tech stack that handles the test of time challenges you, then you are at the right place!


Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design and architecture of highly scalable and reliable backend systems for our SAAS platform.
  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to understand product requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
  • Develop high-quality, efficient, and maintainable code using Java, Python, C++, and other relevant technologies.
  • Implement and maintain distributed systems to handle large volumes of data, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
  • Optimize system performance and scalability to meet the increasing demands of our users.
  • Conduct comprehensive testing and debugging to identify and resolve issues in a timely manner.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in backend development, cloud technologies, and distributed systems.
  • Provide mentorship and technical guidance to junior engineers, fostering their professional growth.
  • Participate in the recruitment and onboarding process of new team members, contributing to the growth of the engineering team.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • Minimum 7 years of professional experience in backend development, with a strong focus on Java, Python, C++, or relevant technologies.
  • Extensive expertise in designing and developing cloud-based SAAS platforms.
  • Proficiency in building distributed systems and working with large-scale datasets.
  • Solid understanding of software design principles, design patterns, and architectural best practices.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug complex issues in a distributed environment.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with a proven ability to work effectively in a cross-functional team.
  • Experience with cloud platforms, such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
  • Familiarity with containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
  • Experience with database systems, both SQL and NoSQL.
  • Contributions to open-source projects or active participation in the software development community.
  • Join Revefi's team and lay the foundation for our data observability solution. Shape the future of the product and deliver a seamless

details.description:
Working at Quantum means that you will be part of a team with seasoned and passionate experts in their respective domains. As a team, we eat complex challenges for breakfast, such as building high-performance Exabyte storage systems that make data centers worldwide cloud storage-ready.


Responsibilities:

  • Framework Development: Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain the distributed object storage framework. This includes the graphical user interface (GUI), REST interface, and distributed task orchestration engine.
  • API Design: Establish and maintain well-documented APIs that facilitate seamless configuration, monitoring, and management of distributed storage nodes.
  • Persistence Layer: Implement and maintain a robust and efficient persistent model for storing configuration and monitoring data within the object storage system.
  • Distributed Task Orchestration: Design and optimize the task orchestration engine to effectively manage tasks across distributed nodes, ensuring both fault tolerance and top-notch performance.
  • Node Provisioning and Monitoring: Create logic for provisioning and monitoring all nodes in the distributed setup, assuring high availability and scalability.
  • Quality Assurance: Develop unit tests, conduct code reviews, and contribute to the development of automated testing frameworks to guarantee the framework's stability and correctness.
  • Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation for the framework, encompassing API documentation, user guides, and developer resources.
  • Collaboration: Work collaboratively with other engineers and stakeholders to comprehend system requirements, gather feedback and propel continuous improvement efforts.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, information technology, information systems, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
  • Proficiency in at least one of the following languages: Python, Go, C++, Java, OCaml, or a willingness to learn additional languages.
  • Basic administration and troubleshooting of Ubuntu Linux.
  • Understanding of Cloud and Enterprise storage concepts and products.
  • Familiarity with scaling concepts such as sharding, networking, and distributed computing.
  • Ability to collaborate effectively within a global and distributed team.
  • Knowledge of Amazon's AWS S3 API, SDKs, and tools.
  • Experience with object storage and distributed systems.
  • Proficiency in algorithms for concurrency, thread safety, and memory management.
  • Familiarity with version control systems like Git, continuous integration with Jenkins, and containerization using Docker.
  • Experience with NoSQL databases like MongoDB.
  • Familiarity with Ansible for automation.
  • Experience with design tools like Figma.
  • Understanding of scaling concepts, including networking and distributed computing.
  • You're passionate about automation.
  • You thrive on teamwork and collaboration, especially when deadlines are at stake.
  • You welcome feedback from peers through code review and pair programming.
  • You appreciate working in an environment with clear coding guidelines and high standards for code quality.
