details.description:
We are looking for a Staff - Performance & E2E quality engineer to join the R& D team in India. The candidate is primarily responsible for driving performance, stability, and quality improvements of the Conviva applications, the architecture, and integrations to ensure optimal end-user experience by working closely with the Development, Quality Engineering, and Operations teams. The candidate should have a proven track record of building automation, monitoring, and data analysis tools for the performance and quality engineering platform that will help Engineering teams understand and make better decisions on how their applications perform and scale. This role is a hands-on technical expert role and not a techno-managerial one. You will need to show maturity and influence by mentoring other senior engineers, establishing and championing technical standards & practices, and resolving architectural conflicts efficiently. You are expected to collaborate with other principals and architects across the organization to build consensus on technical blueprints, undertake PoCs, identify/eliminate tech debt, and adopt sourcing practices.


Responsibtitlies:

  • Work with teams and other principals/architects to develop end-to-end performance and quality engineering strategies and approaches
  • Responsible for selecting/maintaining and integrating the appropriate set of tools, processes, and procedures to ensure overall performance testing efficiency and effectiveness in the operation
  • Play a key role in identifying and optimizing performance bottlenecks in running applications in on-premise or cloud infrastructure
  • Collaborate with different engineering teams and have the end-to-end quality test plan in place
  • Build and sustain a strong working relationship with various teams to foster a team environment and produce/maintain Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) around the aligned test strategy
  • Be empathetic to the customer and domain by resolving ambiguity efficiently with the customer in mind


Requirements:

  • 10+ years of performance quality engineering experience and played an architect/principal level role in handling end-to-end (frontend, Middleware and backend systems) performance tuning and optimizing the platform.
  • Design, develop, and execute performance tests to simulate traffic of large-scale events.
  • Hands-on experience working on Linux/UNIX systems.
  • Ability to work effectively with a distributed and cross-functional team.
  • Strong hands-on experience in JMeter or Gatling or similar load gen tools.
  • Experience in gathering non-functional requirements, and developing test plans.
  • Experience in capacity planning of large enterprise applications.
  • Lead the effort in setting best practices, guidelines, and recommendations in optimizing, and tuning applications and integrations.
  • A proven ability to evaluate performance test script/code and test results, while providing a clear interpretation of risks and mitigation options to non-technical stakeholders.
  • Strong knowledge of monitoring tools that allow for the analysis of system, app health, and potential bottlenecks.
  • Experiencing in identifying bottlenecks and root cause analysis.
  • Experience in various cloud technologies.
  • Experience in analyzing/assessing infrastructure for the given application.
  • Experience in identifying and providing tuning recommendations, for various infrastructure components such as application servers, database servers, message buses, and web servers.
  • Ability to understand various functional knowledge of the application.
  • A strong background in monitoring, profiling, and diagnostics.
  • A working knowledge of databases and tuning for example Oracle and SQL Server.
  • Knowledge of programming languages like Java, J2EE, and any scripting knowledge.
  • Collaborate with the architecture team in devising the best architecture and designs.
  • Establish guiding principles and ensure the architecture's validity to support business functions and future growth.
  • Experience in working with distributed teams, ability to communicate the risks.
  • Experience in performance testing Java and C++ applications.
  • Minimum MS in CS or equivalent with a strong technical foundation.

details.description:
Our Success Team at Sprinklr is responsible for driving product retention, consumption, adoption and growth across a global portfolio of customers. We believe that listening and developing a deep understanding of each customers' objectives, together with the application of purpose built solutions to address those requirements at scale, is the winning formula for long term success and growth of the business.


Our execution is defined by the 3 focus areas, or Obsessions. Our Customer Obsession is going the full distance in understanding what value means to each member of the customers' organization. Our Product Obsession is developing and refining our technology as a way of life. Our Learning Obsession is constantly empowering every team member to reach their full potential. We believe that our clear vision, and robust global execution will enable us to make our customers happier. '


Responsibilities:

  • You will be the owner for the set of accounts and drive product retention, consumption, adoption, engagement and growth for a set of customers.
  • Be able to deliver on, and communicate the value associated with their investment in the Sprinklr platform
  • Understand Customer's current Sprinklr implementation and ensure maximisation of business value realised by the customer through consultative support, training, business reviews and configuration optimisation
  • Ensure that every customer derives the most value possible from the platform leading to retention
  • Be the Strategic Advisor who Establishes and Builds Customer Relationships
  • Establish and nurture senior level relationships built on trust, develop client champions, and identify key stakeholders
  • Become your customer's day-to-day strategic advisor who understands their business challenges and can communicate the positive business outcomes of working with Sprinklr
  • Empower Sprinklr customers to improve their end-customers' digital experiences and achieve business objectives through the adoption of Sprinklr product
  • Develop a deep understanding of customer needs and be able to tie them to specific Sprinklr use cases, product features, benefits, and value propositions and ensure your team knows how to communicate them effectively
  • Be hands on on the platform and updated to Sprinklr's latest features is critical in delivering the best suited solutions to customers
  • Guarantee Retention and Grow the business
  • Increase renewal rates, drive adoption and consumption, improve customer satisfaction, and cultivate Sprinklr advocates to generate new business (upsell and cross-sell)
  • Identify opportunities for customer references and case studies
  • Manage and track key performance indicators (KPIs) - including renewal, consumption, adoption, and expansion commitments - to ensure exceptional, predictable results
  • Calculate risk forecasts based on product adoption; close renewal, upsell, and cross-sell opportunities within assigned client accounts in partnership with relevant Sales Account Executives - while achieving targeted renewal rate
  • Manage Internal Stakeholders
  • Be a customer advocate within Sprinklr providing feedback to engineering teams to develop / identify new features & products
  • Serve as the internal voice of the customer and advocate for your customers' needs (services, support, product management, executive alignment)
  • Work closely with multiple teams (sales. support, product specialists, services etc. ) within Sprinklr


Requirements:

  • 4+ years of experience in B2B SaaS customer success, account management, product management or a strategic consulting organization
  • Deep product management / evangelization experience with the aptitude to learn new products

details.description:
A Procurement Executive plays a vital role in an organization's supply chain and procurement operations. They are responsible for efficiently sourcing, procuring, and managing goods and services to meet the company's operational needs while ensuring cost-effectiveness and maintaining high-quality standards. The following key responsibilities and qualifications are typically associated with this role:


Responsibilities:

  • Sourcing Suppliers: Identify and evaluate potential suppliers, conduct negotiations, and select reliable vendors to source goods and services.
  • Contract Negotiation: Negotiate contracts, terms, and conditions to secure favorable agreements for the organization while considering cost, quality, and delivery requirements.
  • Cost Management: Continuously monitor and analyze market trends and supplier performance to identify cost-saving opportunities and strategies.
  • Supply Chain Optimization: Collaborate with other departments, such as production, logistics, and inventory management, to ensure a smooth and efficient supply chain.
  • Quality Assurance: Implement quality control measures to ensure that procured goods and services meet the organization's quality standards.
  • Inventory Management: Oversee inventory levels and reorder points to maintain an adequate supply of materials while minimizing excess stock.
  • Compliance: Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and company policies, especially in areas like ethical sourcing, sustainability, and diversity.
  • Vendor Relationship Management: Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with suppliers, addressing issues, resolving disputes, and fostering long-term partnerships.
  • Budget Management: Develop and manage procurement budgets, track expenses, and report on cost savings and adherence to budgetary constraints.
  • Data Analysis: Utilize data and analytics to make informed procurement decisions and track key performance indicators (KPIs).
  • Team Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align procurement strategies with the organization's goals and objectives.


Requirements:

  • Education: A bachelor's degree in supply chain management, business, or a related field is typically required. A master's degree or relevant certification can be an added advantage.
  • Experience: Prior experience in procurement, supplier management, or related roles is preferred. The level of experience required may vary depending on the organization.
  • Negotiation Skills: Strong negotiation and contract management skills are essential for securing favorable terms and pricing.
  • Analytical Skills: Proficiency in data analysis and the ability to use data to make informed decisions.
  • Communication: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to build relationships with suppliers and collaborate effectively with internal teams.
  • Detail-Oriented: Attention to detail is crucial for managing contracts, quality control, and cost analysis.
  • Adaptability: Ability to adapt to changing market conditions and business needs.
  • Ethical Conduct: A commitment to ethical procurement practices and corporate responsibility.
details.title: Procurement Executive

As a Backend Developer with expertise in Java, and PostgreSQL, you will play a critical role in developing and maintaining the backend infrastructure of our SaaS and internal platforms, ensuring its reliability, scalability, and performance. Join our team and be a part of building cutting-edge software solutions that empower our customers and drive business growth.

details.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Designing and implementing data pipelines: You would be responsible for designing and implementing data pipelines that extract, transform, and load data from various sources into the SCADA system model. This would involve working with a range of data storage and processing technologies, such as databases, data warehouses, ETL tools, and programming languages like Python.
  • Building and maintaining the SCADA system model: You would be responsible for building and maintaining the SCADA system model, which is used to monitor and control industrial processes. This would involve working with various SCADA software packages and technologies, such as OPC, Modbus, and PLCs, and ensuring that the model accurately reflects the real-world process being monitored.
  • Ensuring data quality and integrity: You would be responsible for ensuring that the data being used by the SCADA system model is of high quality and integrity. This would involve developing and implementing data validation and cleansing processes, as well as monitoring data quality metrics, such as completeness, accuracy, and consistency.
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams: You would work closely with cross-functional teams, such as data analysts, software developers, and process engineers, to ensure that the SCADA system model meets their requirements and integrates with their systems. You may also be responsible for providing technical guidance and support to these teams.
  • Staying up-to-date with emerging technologies: You would be expected to stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and trends in the data engineering and SCADA fields. This would involve attending industry conferences, participating in online communities, and experimenting with new tools and techniques.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
  • At least 5 years of experience in a data engineering role, preferably in Automation Industries and oil & Gas environment with SCADA system Model.
  • Hand on experience on the flow ofdata upstream and downstream.
  • Strong programming skills in Python, (R and SQL are plus)

details.description:
Milaap is seeking highly motivated freshers with an inclination towards customer support and sales to join us as Campaign Associates. The Campaign Associate is the first point of contact for a campaign organiser running a fundraiser on the platform. It is a crucial role, wherein, your interaction with the campaign organiser will determine the experience they will take away from the platform. Your customer centricity is what will drive success in this role, ensuring your campaign organiser is able to raise the funds they intend to for their cause. You will learn from your users daily and collaborate with several cross-functional teams to turn those learnings into action items.


Responsibilities:

  • Identify and develop an end-to-end fundraising strategy for the campaign organizers (individuals / NGOs)
  • Engage and maintain regular communications with campaigners and motivate them to raise funds
  • Manage disbursal of funds- coordinate with internal teams and ensure smooth and timely transfers of funds for campaign organisers
  • Be the single point of contact for all queries that a campaign organiser might have during their fundraising journey
  • Conceptualise, draft, and review the content of the campaigns running on the platform
  • Work with cross-functional teams - social media, and finance to identify areas where the experience of the campaign organiser can be improved
  • You will pass on the feedback and learnings from the campaign organisers to the product and tech team to keep them aware of customer feedback


Requirements:

  • Must have completed bachelor's degree in Bsc, Bcom, BBA or BA with any specialisation
  • Freshers or those with prior internship experience in customer-centric roles can apply
  • Empathy for Strangers: You genuinely care about people and want to help them. You relate to someone who might be going through a difficult time and interact with them personally in a unique case.
  • Power of Persuasion: Your ability to influence should help organisers overcome their fears and hesitancy around raising funds and seeking help.
  • Excellent communication - You can effectively engage with internal teams and campaigners. Over 50% of your time will be spent over telephonic/WhatsApp conversations engaging with organisers.
  • Resourcefulness and Creative thinking: You can come up with ideas to execute for any given situation irrespective of the constraints.
  • Organisational and Problem-Solving Skills - You are super organised and can effectively prioritise multiple tasks during the day.
  • Multilingual - Ability to speak fluently in one regional language apart from English and Hindi is mandatory.
  • Demonstrated skills and interest in one/more of the following is a strong plus: Creative design, video editing, advanced Excel or SQL.
  • Strong commitment to ethics, honesty, and integrity in conducting business.

details.description:
We are looking for a Principal Engineer (Architect) who can drive the design, architecture & delivery of our next-generation platforms keeping scalability, robustness, and security aspects in focus. The platforms you build will be used for marketing, AD delivery & customer engagement across multiple countries with each of them being a multi billion dollar business for Walmart. You will be challenged with unparalleled complex business problems that span across multiple countries and a large number of users & data.


Responsibilities:

  • Drive design, development, implementation, and documentation
  • Interact with Walmart engineering teams across geographies to leverage expertise and
  • contribute to the tech community.
  • Engage with Product Management and Business to drive the agenda, set your priorities, and deliver awesome products.
  • Drive the success of the implementation by applying technical skills, to design and build enhanced processes and technical solutions in support of strategic initiatives.
  • Work closely with Distinguished Architects and cross-functional teams and follow established practices for the delivery of solutions meeting QCD (Quality, Cost & Delivery). Within the established architectural guidelines.
  • Participate in hiring and building teams enabling them to be high-performing agile teams.
  • You will work with engineering teams to create high-level and low-level designs and drive design
  • discussion and technical decisions.
  • You will come up with quality, best practices, and other Non-functional standards and guide the teams to execute them along with helping them with overall technical and design aspects.
  • You will help implement cutting-edge models and algorithms that operate on massive amounts of data and Interact with Walmart cross functional engineering teams as cloud, platform, analytics, etc. across geographies to leverage technical expertise and contribute to the engineering community.


Requirements:

  • B. Tech. / B. E. / M. Tech. / M. S. in Computer Science or relevant discipline
  • 15+ years of experience in the design and development of highly scalable distributed applications
  • and platforms - particularly for multi-tenant, SaaS products.
  • Experience building a 'Code, Deploy, Run' pipeline using DevOps best practices by leveraging the best available CI/CD tools.
  • Strong computer science fundamentals: data structures, algorithms, and design patterns.
  • Own Tech Debt/Tech Modernization - Ability to balance the long-term "big picture" and short-term implications of design decisions.
  • Having proficiency Java/J2EE, Microservices, Cloud Native Architecture
  • Hands-on experience in Microservices, and RESTful webservices development in Java/NodeJS(SpringBoot, Dropwizard, or equivalent framework).
  • Strong understanding of Javascript, NodeJS, and Frontend frameworks
  • Good Experience of React and Redux
  • Good knowledge of messaging systems: Kafka / RabbitMQ
  • In-depth knowledge of Cloud Native Architecture, Microservice Architecture, and related stacks (Service Registry, ELK / Splunk, service registry, VMs, etc. ) and container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, etc. )
  • Knowledge of at least one of Azure/Google Cloud Platforms.
  • Self-starter with the ability to multitask across several priority areas in the face of fuzzy situations.
  • Demonstrated end-to-end ownership for the development and design of at least one cloud-based project.
  • Strong hands-on development skills to prototype technical solutions.
  • Strong desire to drive change, and ability to adapt to change quickly. Proficient in new and emerging technologies.
  • Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills - including negotiation, facilitation, and consensus-building skills; ability to influence and persuade, without direct control.
  • Mentoring/coaching Senior staff engineers and other Engineers.
  • Focus on reusability, frameworks, patterns and configuration tools for faster development.
  • Contributing back to open source.
  • Practitioner of Agile (Scrum) methodology

details.description:
We are looking for a passionate individual who can look into the daily operations of the finance team. Their primary job is to ensure that the accounting activities run in a smooth and efficient manner. This position offers an outstanding chance to acquire extensive technical expertise as you manage the complete accounting procedures for both Indian and US GAAP, billing, and compliance independently, all while indulging your passion for numbers.


Responsibilities:

  • Manage and oversee the daily operations of the accounting department, including but not limited to Receipts/ Payment, Accounts payable/receivable, Fund Flow/ Cash Flow preparation, Sale invoicing, Purchase Invoicing, Expense process, Interest handling, General ledger recon, Daily Bank Reconciliation, Revenue & Expenditure Analyzing, Project budgeting forecasting, and investment monitoring, Debtor & Creditor reconciliation.
  • Posting daily accounting entries in ERP and preparing weekly BRS.
  • Prepares asset, liability, and capital account entries by compiling and analyzing account information along with depreciation & amortization.
  • Prepaid and provisions process on a monthly basis.
  • Documents financial transactions by entering account information. Recommends financial actions by analyzing accounting options.
  • Summarizes current financial status by collecting information, and preparing Monthly profit and loss statements, and other reports.
  • Prepare policies and procedures and ensure compliance with the same.
  • Maintains accounting controls by preparing and recommending policies and procedures
  • Reconciles financial discrepancies by collecting and analyzing account information.


Requirements:

  • CA-Intermediate/MBA(Finance) with 1-2 years of prior experience in accounting and compliance.
  • Advanced computer skills in MS Office
  • Prior experience in working with accounting software like Netsuite would be an added advantage.
  • Knowledge of advanced accounting principles, Statutory laws, etc.

Khoros is looking for an enthusiastic Senior Technical Writer with a passion for producing high-quality, documentation to help customers use and become experts with our products. The Senior Technical Writer is responsible for the development and curation of technical content for the Khoros product suite. You will document new products and features from scratch, as well as edit and reorganize existing content.


This role functions as part product subject matter expert, part customer advocate, and part content specialist. Senior Technical Writers contribute to larger projects and conversations around process improvement, operational efficiency, and the creation of a world-class customer experience while balancing the daily demands of document creation in support of an agile product roadmap and robust existing catalog of material.


Responsibilities:

  • Has a passion to understand and guide users and help them be successful in using our products.
  • Creates documentation plans and technical documents for new software features that address real-world customer personas and use cases.
  • Scopes, plans, and communicates estimates for new feature releases.
  • Manages incoming documentation improvement requests.
  • Works with the team to ensure that all customer-facing UI text strings are clear, grammatically correct, accurate, and written in simple English.
  • Participates in our customer community to help build knowledge, identify and cultivate best practices, and generally help deliver a superior social customer experience.
  • Provides recommendations on the best content types and approaches in support of varying customer needs.


Requirements:

  • 5-10 years of experience writing documentation for technical and end-user audiences
  • Ability to provide content samples for end-user and admin-user audiences
  • Has expertise with industry-standard writing paradigms
  • Has expertise with technical writing and content strategy best practices
  • Proficiency with HTML and use of community software products a plus
  • Maintains productivity and high performance levels under pressure

  • Team Player: A collaborative and adaptable team player who thrives in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.

Join our team and make a significant impact on our brand's marketing endeavors while building strong connections with our valued audience

This position is ideal for a senior software engineer or a lead who is passionate about solving challenging business problems and build streaming data processing pipelines for one of our clients who is foremost experts in blockchain and crypto asset data management. You will be focusing on design and build solutions that leverage data to solve business problems. Sometimes you will be designing brand-new solutions, and at other times you may be refactoring existing functionality for performance and maintainability, but always working on ways to make us more efficient and provide better solutions to our clients. You will be extensively involved in leading hands-on software engineering activities including POCs, design, development, and testing of new functionality. The role is for a self-motivated individual with software engineering skills and knowledge of Java, Kotlin, Kafka and experience in processing stream data.


Requirements:

  • You must be flexible and willing to switch tasks based on the team's needs as this functionality and pipeline is being developed from scratch.
  • You must have strong Java and Spring Boot skill set.
  • Stream Data pipeline development and stream data processing using Kafka.
  • You will also help the delivery manager to build a team of 2-3 junior software engineers and lead them.
  • Support the delivery manager in growing the team by identifying opportunities.
  • Primary - Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, Kafka, AWS usage.
  • o Collection API & Stream API
  • o GOF, Singleton, MVC design patterns
  • o Dependency injection, factory design pattern and inversion of control
  • o Spring Boot features for Microservices Applications
  • o Lambda expressions, Interface Default and Static Methods, Method Reference,
  • Parameters Name, Optional, Streams, Concurrency
  • o Stream data processing using Kafka
  • Secondary - Apache Flink, Kubernetes
  • Hands-on experience in microservices.
  • Experience in integration with AWS and using cloud services.
  • Experience in development and production support.
  • Familiarity with microservice-based architecture in AWS cloud environment.
  • Experience in ETL and building pipelines for steaming/real time data. e. g., 500K messages per second to be consumed and build connectivity with crypto currency/exchanges.
  • Experience in working with client manager, architect, and tech team at client side.
  • Experience in frameworks like Apache Flink is good to have.
  • Experience in the Finance domain (Crypto, Fintech, Hedge funds) is a big plus.

details.description:
As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will be responsible for designing and executing comprehensive digital marketing strategies to promote our AI dynamic pricing product in the travel, retail, and entertainment verticals. Your primary focus will be to build brand awareness, generate customer interest in the form of inbound leads, through leveraging marketing automation, social media marketing, email marketing, website, SEO and SEM, and other relevant channels.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute digital marketing strategies to drive brand awareness, lead generation, and customer acquisition for our B2B SaaS products.
  • Planned, created, and managed engaging content for various digital platforms, including LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and other relevant social media channels.
  • Build a strong content-led inbound leads funnel, by creative and effective use of SEO, relevant blog and whitepaper posts on the website, inbound links through blog sites such as medium.com, etc.
  • Apply performance marketing strategies, and manage and optimize paid advertising campaigns on Search Engines (SEM), and Social media platforms like LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and others to reach target audiences and achieve campaign objectives.
  • Execute email marketing campaigns, including creating compelling email content, managing subscriber lists, and monitoring campaign effectiveness.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including sales, product, and design, to align marketing efforts with overall business goals and ensure consistent messaging across all channels.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices, and make recommendations for incorporating new techniques into marketing strategies.
  • Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify new opportunities and potential areas for growth.
  • Analyze our website traffic and user engagement, and build data-driven strategies to improve discovery, engagement, and conversions.
  • Track and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) to evaluate the effectiveness of digital marketing initiatives and provide regular reports to management.
  • Work closely with internal and external stakeholders, including design and content teams, to create compelling marketing materials and collateral.


Requirements:

Responsibilities:

  • Complete technical ownership of Engineering systems that lead to a significant value delivery to the end-user, e. g. Consumer experience, Transaction management
  • system, etc. You will own this with product managers and business folks. You are supposed to be equally responsible for the success/failure of the various initiatives.

  • Work with product managers, developers, QA to deliver timely releases to production.
  • Own and deliver on engineering-driven cross-functional OKRs
  • Hire, mentor to build a high performance engineering team.
  • Understanding and ability to pick the right system components i. e. which DB, which language with some directions
  • Come up with high level and low level designs for Business requirements, pick up 3rd party libraries, open source or commercial sub-systems to fast-track execution.
  • Responsible for production deployment of code and support for any production issues.
  • Continuously drive improvements to innovation throughput & quality of the org by investing and nurturing key capabilities and processes
  • Leadership:
  • Be calm and self-confident even in an ever-changing business environment and ability to drive outcomes in challenging circumstances.
  • Ability to handle some ambiguity and chaos of a very fast-paced environment.
  • Must have held primary/shared responsibility for key results at a company/business unit/product line level
  • Communicate effectively in an environment where multiple internal/external stakeholders are involved.
  • Hiring and Building performing engineering teams


Requirements:

  • At least 9-12 years in a top-tier product company and experience in managing a team of 10-15 team members
  • Early and growth stage experience in a B2C startup is a big plus
  • Proven ability in architecture and building scalable systems
  • Proficiency in system design. Good understanding of scalability and how various distributed systems work.
  • Design, optimize, and integrate business processes across disparate systems and mobile technologies
  • Strong in low-level design/ design patterns/ OOPs concepts.

Are you ready to revolutionise the small business banking industry with us?

  • Onboarding Experience

details.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Monitor and maintain data platforms, databases, and data pipelines to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues, such as performance bottlenecks, data inconsistencies, and data quality problems.
  • Implement and maintain monitoring, alerting, and logging systems to proactively identify and address data-related issues.
  • Liaison with engineering teams for RCA's(Root Cause Analysis), permanent resolutions on issues affecting production sites.
  • Collaborate with the data Engineering team to maintain data pipelines and workflows.
  • Assist in capacity planning and optimisation of data storage and processing resources.
  • Collaborate with data engineering and data science teams to understand their requirements and provide guidance on data infrastructure and best practices.
  • Participate in incident response, root cause analysis, and post-incident reviews to continuously improve system reliability and performance.
  • Stay updated with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices related to data infrastructure and operations.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Strong understanding of data concepts, relational databases, and SQL.
  • Familiarity with data infrastructure technologies such as data warehouses, data lakes, ETL/ELT processes, and streaming platforms.
  • Proficiency in scripting or programming languages such as Python, Perl, or Java.
  • Experience with any one of the ETL tools such as Nifi, Airflow, and Debezium is a must.
  • Experience with cloud platforms (e. g AWS, Azure, GCP) and containerisation (e. g Docker, Kubernetes) and datawarehouse (e. g., Redshift) are a plus.
  • Knowledge of monitoring and observability tools for data systems (e. g. Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack) is beneficial.
  • Experience with version control and CICD tools like Git and Jenkins is preferred.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
  • Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders.

  • Provide guidance, mentorship, and leadership to a multidisciplinary engineering team comprising Python backend developers, UI engineers, and DevOps.
  • Ensure that the team's skills and knowledge are continuously updated and aligned with industry best practices.
  • Task Management and Assignment:
  • Oversee day-to-day operations of the development team ensuring timely and efficient project delivery.
  • Actively assign, manage, and track tasks with the in-house development team to ensure optimal resource utilization and adherence to timelines.
  • From Business to Technical:
  • Interface with product managers, stakeholders, and other teams to gather, understand, and convert business requirements into clear technical specifications and actionable tasks.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure that the engineering output aligns well with business objectives and customer needs.
  • Architecture Design and Implementation:
  • Lead the design, development, and implementation of scalable web application architectures ensuring the efficient functioning of the application and its components.
  • Regularly review and optimize the existing architecture to accommodate evolving business needs and to handle scalability challenges.
  • Edge Computing:
  • Design, develop, and implement solutions for edge devices with limited computational capabilities.
  • Ensure seamless data flow and integration between edge devices and the main application servers, making certain that performance and security standards are upheld.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Master's degree or equivalent experience.
  • Must have 5+ years of experience with Python, Linux, and Product development.
  • Must have 3+ years of experience with Django.
  • 2-3 years of experience in leading technical teams with a proven track record of successful project deliveries.
  • Strong expertise in Python, modern web technologies, and UI frameworks.
  • Deep understanding of cloud infrastructures and services.
  • Experience working with edge computing and designing solutions for devices with limited compute.
  • Familiarity with continuous integration, deployment, and delivery tools.
  • Experience as a Product Manager is a plus

details.description:
As a Technical Lead in our Data Backbone Project team, you will be responsible for the successful planning, implementation, and management of the software architecture building blocks of the enterprise data layer spanning across business domains. You will be collaborating with a cross-functional team to where you leverage your extensive technical expertise to lead the development of cutting-edge solutions that harness the power of data to drive our business forward.


Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into implementation level data architecture solutions.
  • Design and develop scalable and efficient data models, while evaluating and selecting appropriate data storage and processing technologies for big data applications
  • Hands-on role in coding, data processing, and development activities, ensuring adherence to best practices and high-quality standards.
  • Implement testing and quality assurance processes to ensure the reliability and accuracy of data-driven solutions.
  • Ensure adherence to data governance and security policies to ensure data integrity and compliance with regulatory requirements while enabling seamless data availability and sharing to serve business goals.
  • Optimize and tune data architectures for performance, reliability, and scalability.
  • Develop and maintain documentation for data architecture building blocks and data flows.
  • Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies in big data and data management.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Proven industry experience (5+ years) in relevant projects with a focus on big data and enterprise level data solutions
  • In-depth knowledge of data modeling, database design, and data storage concepts.
  • Proficiency in working with big data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, SQL, and NoSQL databases (e. g., Cassandra, MongoDB).
  • Expertise in Data Lake and Databricks
  • Expertise in data integration, ETL processes, and data pipeline development.
  • Expertise with cloud-based data platforms (e. g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team environment.
  • Data governance and security expertise is a big plus.

details.description:
We are seeking a skilled NLP Engineer / AI expert to join our team as lead data scientist. The successful candidate will be responsible for leading, building and operationalizing a variety of recommendation algorithms and NLP models including summarization, question-answering, semantic search, named entity recognition, knowledge discovery, document understanding, and text classification.


Responsibilities:

  • Lead data-driven projects from definition to execution, from gathering data, and defining metrics to communicating actionable insights;
  • Propose innovative solutions by exploratory data analysis from complex and high-dimensional datasets, applying statistical and modeling techniques to evaluate performance, make valuable discoveries and solve non-routine analysis problems;
  • Use a flexible, analytical approach to design predictive models and advanced algorithms that lead to optimal value extraction from the data;
  • Analyze large sets of news data set from various sources, including websites, wikis, conversation platforms, social media platforms, and databases
  • Build NLP/AI models to extract knowledge from these sources and create appropriate models that will indirectly or directly help our content publishers in their day-to-day operations.
  • Develop response blending and summarisation models to provide an overview of search results from these sources
  • Be involved in operationalizing these models in highly demanding production environments
  • Conduct regular tests of the models to ensure they meet desired metrics on both benchmark and usage datasets


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.
  • Experience in deep learning frameworks (Tensorflow or PyTorch)
  • Experience with NLP models, frameworks, and libraries (Hugging Face, Haystack, etc)
  • Experience with fine-tuning LLMs as well as prompt engineering on GPT models (good to have)
  • Experience with Python
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Minimum 7 years of related job experience
details.title: Lead Data Scientist

details.description:
As the Lead Product Designer you will be responsible for driving the design strategy, and execution of our product portfolio. Your role will involve collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers and engineers to create user-centric designs that meet business objectives and drive customer satisfaction. You will lead a team of designers and guide them in delivering high-quality design solutions. The ideal candidate is a creative problem solver with a deep understanding of user experience principles and a track record of delivering successful SaaS products.


Responsibilities:

  • Design Strategy and Vision:
  • Collaborate with product managers and stakeholders to align design initiatives with business goals
  • Define and articulate the design strategy and vision for our product portfolio.
  • User-Centric Design:
  • Create intuitive and engaging user experiences by applying user-centered design principles.
  • Develop user personas, user flows, wireframes, and interactive prototypes to communicate design concepts.
  • Design Leadership:
  • Lead and mentor a team of product designers, providing guidance and feedback to enhance their skills and deliver high-quality designs.
  • Foster a collaborative and inclusive design culture, promoting best practices and design thinking across the organization.
  • Drive the evolution and improvement of design processes and tools.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration:
  • Work closely with product managers and engineers to ensure the successful implementation of design solutions.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders from various departments to understand their requirements and incorporate their feedback into the design process.
  • Communicate design concepts effectively to stakeholders and advocate for user-centered design principles.
  • Design Quality and Consistency:
  • Ensure consistency and maintain design standards across all products and features.
  • Conduct design reviews to ensure designs meet quality benchmarks and align with brand guidelines.
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and design best practices.


Requirements:

  • 8+ years of experience in product design, with a focus on B2B SaaS products.
  • Demonstrated experience leading design initiatives and managing a design team.
  • Proven track record of delivering successful and innovative design solutions.
  • Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite.
  • Strong knowledge of user-centered design principles, information architecture, and interaction design.
  • Strong cross-functional collaboration abilities, working closely with product managers, engineers, and other stakeholders.
  • Passion for understanding user needs and advocating for the best user experience.
  • Experience conducting user research, usability testing, and incorporating feedback into design iterations.
  • Proven leadership abilities, with experience mentoring and guiding a team of designers.
  • Ability to foster a positive and inclusive design culture.
details.title: Lead Product Designer

details.description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated SDE2 with a strong DevOps background to join our team. As an SDE2 - DevOps, you will play a crucial role in maintaining and deploying highly-available, fault-tolerant systems at scale. Your primary focus will be on encouraging and implementing automated processes to streamline workflows and improve efficiency. You should have a passion for automating repetitive tasks using scripting languages like Bash, Python, Ruby, etc.


Responsibilities:

  • Maintaining and Deploying Highly-Available Systems: You will be responsible for ensuring the smooth operation and high availability of our systems at scale. This includes proactively monitoring the infrastructure, identifying potential issues, and implementing solutions to minimise downtime.
  • Automation: Drive automation initiatives across the organization. Work on automating repetitive tasks to increase efficiency and reduce manual intervention in the deployment and management of systems.
  • Expertise with Google Cloud Platform (GCP): You should have in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with various GCP services, including IAM (Identity and Access Management), Compute Engine, Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), and Load Balancing.
  • Version Control System: Proficiency in working with version control systems like Git is essential. You will be responsible for managing code repositories and ensuring proper versioning and collaboration within the team.
  • CI/CD Implementation: Implement and optimize continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines using tools like Jenkins, TravisCI, or equivalent. Automate the build, test, and deployment processes.
  • Database Expertise: Possess experience with both relational databases (e. g., MySQL) and NoSQL databases (e. g., MongoDB, Redis). Ensure the proper setup, maintenance, and optimisation of databases.
  • Monitoring Implementation: Implement monitoring solutions such as ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana), Datadog, Prometheus, Loki, Filebeat, etc., to gain insights into system performance and troubleshoot issues effectively.
  • Effective Communication: Communicate effectively with team members, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and goals.
  • Infrastructure Setup: Set up and configure the necessary tools and infrastructure required for smooth development, testing, and deployment processes.
  • DevOps Processes: Define and establish development, testing, release, update, and support processes for seamless DevOps operations.
  • Cybersecurity Measures: Collaborate with the security team to deploy appropriate cybersecurity measures. Conduct vulnerability assessments and risk management regularly.
  • Incident Management: Handle incident management, including root cause analysis, to identify and resolve system issues promptly.
  • Kubernetes and GKE: Demonstrate experience and expertise in Kubernetes and Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) to manage containerized applications efficiently.
  • Bridging Dev and Ops Gap: Understand the requirements gap between development and operations teams and provide effective solutions to streamline collaboration and efficiency.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
  • 3-4 years of experience in a DevOps role or a related field.
  • Strong experience with GCP services (IAM, Compute Engine, VPC, LB).
  • Proficiency in version control systems, particularly Git.
  • Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, TravisCI, or equivalent.
  • Familiarity with MySQL and NoSQL databases (e. g., MongoDB, Redis).
  • Solid scripting skills using Bash, Python, Ruby, or similar languages.

details.description:
We are looking for engineering managers who have hands-on experience in building highly reliable, low latency, high throughout, distributed systems. As an Engineering owner, systems you will build, will serve millions of our users who use Niyo apps for next-gen digital banking experience. At Niyo, we believe in Customer Obsession, Ownership, Teamwork, Bias for Action, and insist on High standards are a way of life and then be a part of our journey. You will be expected to further this Engineering culture, contribute to it, and make Niyo one of the best places to work for. To be successful as an engineering manager, you should have exceptional foresight, great communication skills, hands-on knowledge of different engineering disciplines and how they relate to one another, and an aptitude for managing risk. Ideally, candidates will have proof of their supervisory and technical skills, and an appreciation for the complex nature of the industry.


As an Engineering owner, you will have complete ownership of design, development, release, maintenance, production efficiency and business effectiveness of the systems that your team will build. In addition, you are also responsible for building an all-star team which will include Hiring, mentoring, junior team members and be responsible for their career growth at Niyo. In summary, if building high performance engineering systems and managing teams that serve the needs of a growing user segment excites you, we have a job that matches your expectations!


Responsibilities:

  • Complete technical ownership of Engineering systems that lead to a significant value delivery to the end-user, e. g. Consumer experience, Transaction management system, etc.
  • You will own this with product managers and business folks.
  • You are supposed to be equally responsible for the success/failure of the various initiatives.
  • We work in POD set ups where each POD is responsible for business outcomes - we sail together or fail together!
  • Work with product managers, developers, QA to deliver timely releases to production.
  • Own and deliver on engineering-driven cross-functional OKRs
  • Hire, mentor to build a high performance engineering team.
  • Understanding and ability to pick the right system components i. e. which DB, which language with some directions
  • Come up with high level and low level designs for Business requirements, pick up 3rd party libraries, open source or commercial sub-systems to fast-track execution.
  • Responsible for production deployment of code and support for any production issues.
  • Continuously drive improvements to innovation throughput & quality of the org by investing and nurturing key capabilities and processes


Requirements:

  • At least 9-12 years in a top tier product company and experience in managing a team of 10-15 team members
  • Early and growth stage experience in a B2C startup is a big plus
  • Proven ability in architecture and building scalable systems
  • Proficiency in system design. Good understanding of scalability and how various distributed systems work.
  • Design, optimize and integrate business processes across disparate systems and mobile technologies
  • Strong in low level design/ design patterns/ OOPs concepts.
  • Must be able to make design choices that has long term impact of system extensibility and maintainability
  • Comfortable with Microservices, Cloud based deployments, serverless development, NoSQL databases, and various communication protocols i. e. REST/ Message queues/ RPC.
  • Good knowledge of mobile frameworks like Flutter, iOS, Android, HTML5 CSS3
